title: All I want for Christmas is soloque.
body: Can we get an actual solo que where everyone in the que is solo and remove 4 person ques. Every game I have with a 4 person que is extreamly toxic and usually a lost game and is ruing my soloque experience.

replies.body:
I don't have a problem with duo's, even though I mainly solo queue. I do agree that 3-4 people should not be placed against a bunch of randoms and perhaps 1 duo queue.

I haven't had the experience of being the random in a 4-man premade yet, but I've heard a lot of stories like yours that it's basically a dogpile if you don't toe their line.

I just had a game where they took a brand new player up to gold level and put him as my support. Needless to say the game didn't end well and I got flamed for feeding the entire game, probably to make the new player feel better.

> I just had a game where they took a brand new player up to gold level and put him as my support. Needless to say the game didn't end well and I got flamed for feeding the entire game, probably to make the new player feel better.

I'm level 12. My last game was against a 4-man premade with a level 30 Silver player. You can see it in lolking and op.gg. It was complete crap.

I still think duo-queues are fine though. But past that, they should be thrown into team vs team matchups.
